metadata.title: Shenbolen Women African Satin Nightcap Bonnet Sleeping Hat Soft Elastic (One Size, D)

categorization.explanation: The product is a satin nightcap bonnet for sleeping, which is used to protect and style hair during sleep. Therefore, it falls under the 'Hair Styling Accessories' subcategory of 'Hair Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
